select e.emp_no,t.team_name,t.team_no, e.emp_access, e.emp_position, e.sign_no, e.dayoff_cnt, e.emp_year,e.hire_date, e.emp_state, e.reg_date, e.mod_date, e.password, e.name, e.email,e.phone_num,e.address,e.birthdate,e.retire_date from emp e JOIN team t ON e.team_no = t.team_no
AND e.emp_no=#{emp_no}
AND e.name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND e.emp_no LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND t.team_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by e.emp_no desc
